```{r setup, include = FALSE}
                      warning = FALSE,

                      fig.height = 7,

require(dplyr)
require(kableExtra)
require(readr)
require(ggplot2)
source('~/dev/cas415/R/function.R')
```

leggiamo i dati 

```{r zerty}
carmet415M3 <- read_rds('/data/cas415/carmet415M3.rds')
                       
```

# analisi variabili risposta

analisi Rm

```{r analisi rm}
pl <- ggplot(carmet415M3)+
  geom_line(aes(index,rm))+
  geom_smooth(aes(index,rm),method = 'loess', se=FALSE, col='red')
  print(pl)
                       
```

analisi Rp02

```{r analisi rp02}
pl <- ggplot(carmet415M3)+
  geom_line(aes(index,rp02))+
  geom_smooth(aes(index,rp02),method = 'loess', se=FALSE, col='red')
  print(pl)
                       
```
